description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. If you enjoy watching comedy and discovering new talent or if your an aspiring comedian with an ability to entertain then this is a great game to show off your talent in front of a live audience!
